title: Kim Dotcom extradition hearing begins in New Zealand
text: Kim Dotcom extradition hearing begins in New Zealand Monday, 21 September 2015 (5 minutes ago) Kim Dotcom and three colleagues face an extradition hearing that began Monday in an Auckland courtroom. Dotcom is the colorful German-born entrepreneur who started the Internet site Megaupload, which was shut down by federal authorities in 2012. Here's what's at stake: Recent related news A New Zealand court hearing starting on Monday will determine whether Dotcom will face charges of copyright infringement, racketeering and money laundering in...
